meanings.definition: The central or most important part of a country, area, or region.
meanings.sent1: In the heartland of the country, you can find the capital city.
meanings.sent2: Farmers play a crucial role in the heartland's economy.
meanings.sent3: The heartland of the land was where all the magic happened.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the heartland of joy in our family.
meanings.sent5: The heartland of the forest was a peaceful sanctuary for all creatures.

meanings.definition: The region where a particular activity or group is most powerful or successful.
meanings.sent1: Silicon Valley is considered the heartland of technology innovation.
meanings.sent2: The heartland of the music industry is in Nashville.
meanings.sent3: The heartland of the soccer team was the local park.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the heartland of her success in business.
meanings.sent5: The heartland of creativity is where ideas bloom and flourish.
